blocks.content:
## Welcome to my slice on the web.

Here you can find my latest blog posts, thoughts and journey of how I've gotten where I am today. In addition to my current role at Travel Nation, I am currently working on these projects.

### Power Stack

I am currently working on Power Stack, a boilerplate to get started with Gatsby and Drupal 8. You can have a look at the Github repo here: [https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack](https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack "https://github.com/whiteskyweb/Power-Stack")

### Page builder for Drupal 8

A part of that work has involved creating a page builder for Drupal 8 which allows for much more user-friendly editing experience in Drupal 8.

<iframe width="780" height="500" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zFyPe4brR2s" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

### Seaside Admin for Drupal 8

Beautify your site with Seaside Admin. I created the Seaside Admin theme for Drupal 8 to improve the UX and expirenece of using Drupal 8.  Check it out for yourself at [https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin](https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin "https://www.drupal.org/project/seaside_admin")  or simply run:

    composer require 'drupal/seaside_admin:^1.9'

### This site was built using [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org) and [TinaCMS](https://www.tinacms.org).

Both of which are super awesome you should check them out!.  The code is available to download and and fork to your heart's content.  Check it o
